title: Kelsen's endgame
abstract: Having supposed a super-norm we may indeed suppose another still superior norm, and so on ad infinitum, like the elephants and tortoise which have been supposed to support the earth. Clearly there is no help in that
publisher: Cambridge University Press for the Faculty of Law, University of Cambridge
